A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie took all of Luke's growth as a jedi we saw in the original trilogy and tossed it over its shoulder down a cliff. Rian Johnson seems to be saying through emo villain Kylo Ren what he was thinking that caused him to excrete this vile feces out all over everything that was Star Wars: \"Let the past die. Kill it if you have to.\" But\, Rian\, you didn't have to. You had a choice. You chose poorly.
